name: test_e2e_with_logs[007_SQLI_ADV_081]
description:

| Item | Value |

| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_081` |
| **Name** | Boolean Injection with Quotes |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
